experience.title: Market Research Analyst
experience.description: iResearch Services is one of the leading business and consumer research organization. Today, our organization is one of Top 10 research firms in India according to Silicon India Magazine 2015, one of the best contact centers globally by Stevie Awards 2015, and Red Herring Asia's Top 100 company 2012. We are experts in research data collection via telephonic and online, and pride ourselves one of leaders in the insight-management business.-Primarily involved in conducting research surveys through telephonic interviews globally and recording the feedback with 100% accuracy.-Conducting telephonic (CATI) and web-based (CAWI) interviews with CXOs, VPs, Directors, Senior and Mid Level executives across different geographies in various Industries.-Company Profiling: Studying and analyzing the business needs of clients and prospects, conducting market research.-Performing CATI and CAWI interviews in different geographies.-Performing In-depth Interview and probe for information resulting in valuable qualitative and quantitative data.-Prepare Transcripts of the interviews as per the client requirements.-Building Databases through various search engines like Slintel, ZoomInfo, LinkedIn, One Source, Google, Bloomberg, Hoovers, etc.-Performing Market Research across industry verticals such as Information Technology, Financial Services, Retail, Manufacturing, Telecommunication, Health-care, Energy and Utilities, Pharmacy, Automobiles, etc.iResearch Services is one of the leading business and consumer research organization.
